messages.subject: re: Adoption - medical records
messages.msgSnippet: **Your bio parents were probably both still young at the time of your birth** **Nope! Bio dad was Korean war vet, lost a leg. Bio mom was in her early
messages.messageBody:
**Your bio parents were probably both still young at the time of your birth**

**Nope! Bio dad was Korean war vet, lost a leg.
Bio mom was in her early thirties, **

Thirty is young, relatively. :)

Anyway, you proved my point. :) You say you're worried a bit because you
heard your biomom died of some kind of cancer - that wouldn't have been in a
medical history taken at the time of your birth. Perhaps a checkup is a good
place to start to put a check on the niggling worry, since you're sure you
can't find out anything more.

You'd be surprised how many adoption records were "destroyed in a fire".

Deborah in IL
